ExpProperties.EpDescription: Percent tolerance to apply to the configured PPPoL2TPv2 session connect rate to determine if the actual session connect rate is acceptable

ExpProperties.EpDescription: Enable a check of the successful session connect rate against a percent tolerance of the configured session connect rate

Children.Name: Run SQL Command: Session Rate Results [1]

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Run SQL Command: Session Rate Results [1]

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PppoL2tp_IterationNumber (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, IterationNumber)
SELECT
AS IterationNumber
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PppoL2tp_IterationMode (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, IterationMode)

SELECT IterState AS IterationMode FROM spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand WHERE (SELECT Iter.Handle FROM Tag AS Tag, RelationTable AS RT, spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand AS Iter WHERE Tag.Name='spirent.methodology.benchmarkstabilityiteratorcommand.11111' AND RT.TargetHnd=Tag.Handle AND RT.SourceHnd=Iter.Handle AND RT.Type='UserTag')

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PppoL2tp_SessionRateResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, IterationMode, Location, EmulationType, Sessions, SessionsUp, MinSetupTime, MaxSetupTime, AvgSetupTime, ConfigSetupRate, SuccSetupRate)

SELECT (SELECT IterationNumber FROM PppoL2tp_IterationNumber) AS Iteration, (SELECT IterationMode FROM PppoL2tp_IterationMode) AS IterationMode, Port.Location AS Location, L2tpPortConfig.L2tpNodeType AS EmulationType, Sessions, SessionsUp, MinSetupTime, MaxSetupTime, AvgSetupTime, Config.ConnectRate AS ConfigSetupRate, SuccSetupRate FROM PppoePortResults AS Res, PppoxPortConfig AS Config, Port AS Port, L2tpPortConfig  WHERE Res.ParentHnd = Config.Handle AND Port.Handle = Config.ParentHnd AND Port.Handle = L2tpPortConfig.ParentHnd

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PppoL2tp_TunnelResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, IterationMode, Location, EmulationType, Tunnels, TunnelUpCount, TunnelDownCount, MinTunnelSetupTime, MaxTunnelSetupTime, AvgTunnelSetupTime, TunnelSetupRate)

SELECT (SELECT IterationNumber FROM PppoL2tp_IterationNumber) AS Iteration, (SELECT IterationMode FROM PppoL2tp_IterationMode) AS IterationMode, Port.Location AS Location, Config.L2tpNodeType AS EmulationType, (LacCount*(select TunnelCount from L2tpv2BlockConfig)) AS Tunnels, TunnelUpCount, TunnelDownCount, MinTunnelSetupTime, MaxTunnelSetupTime, AvgTunnelSetupTime, TunnelSetupRate FROM L2tpPortResults AS Res, L2tpPortConfig AS Config, Port AS Port WHERE Res.ParentHnd = Config.Handle AND Port.Handle = Config.ParentHnd

ExpressionCommand.Name: Test Methodology: Wait For Property Value Command

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Test Methodology: Wait For Property Value Command

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Test Methodology: Execute With Tags Command (ARP on streamblocks)

ExpProperties.EpDescription: Amount of time in seconds to run traffic between clients and hosts

ExpProperties.EpDescription: PPPoX Disconnect IPCP mode (should match clients and servers and PPPoX connect)

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 5263
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Maximum amount of time in seconds to wait for PPPoX sessions to disconnect

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PppoL2tp_IterationNumber (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, IterationNumber)
SELECT
AS IterationNumber
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PppoL2tp_IterationMode (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, IterationMode)

SELECT IterState AS IterationMode FROM spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand WHERE (SELECT Iter.Handle FROM Tag AS Tag, RelationTable AS RT, spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand AS Iter WHERE Tag.Name='spirent.methodology.benchmarkstabilityiteratorcommand.11111' AND RT.TargetHnd=Tag.Handle AND RT.SourceHnd=Iter.Handle AND RT.Type='UserTag')

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PppoL2tp_IterationNumber (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, IterationNumber)
DELETE FROM PppoL2tp_IterationNumber
SELECT
AS IterationNumber
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PppoL2tp_IterationMode (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, IterationMode)
DELETE FROM PppoL2tp_IterationMode

SELECT IterMode AS IterationMode FROM spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand WHERE (SELECT Iter.Handle FROM Tag AS Tag, RelationTable AS RT, spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand AS Iter WHERE Tag.Name='spirent.methodology.benchmarkstabilityiteratorcommand.11111' AND RT.TargetHnd=Tag.Handle AND RT.SourceHnd=Iter.Handle AND RT.Type='UserTag')

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PppoL2tp_IterationSessionRateResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, IterationMode, Location, EmulationType, Sessions, SessionsUp, MinSetupTime, MaxSetupTime, AvgSetupTime, SuccSetupRate)

SELECT Iteration, IterationMode, Location, EmulationType, Sessions, SessionsUp, MinSetupTime, MaxSetupTime, AvgSetupTime, SuccSetupRate FROM PppoL2tp_SessionRateResults WHERE Iteration = (SELECT IterationNumber FROM PppoL2tp_IterationNumber)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PppoL2tp_IterationTunnelResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, IterationMode, Location, EmulationType, Tunnels, TunnelUpCount, TunnelDownCount, MinTunnelSetupTime, MaxTunnelSetupTime, AvgTunnelSetupTime, TunnelSetupRate)

SELECT Iteration, IterationMode, Location, EmulationType, Tunnels, TunnelUpCount, TunnelDownCount, MinTunnelSetupTime, MaxTunnelSetupTime, AvgTunnelSetupTime, TunnelSetupRate FROM PppoL2tp_TunnelResults WHERE Iteration = (SELECT IterationNumber FROM PppoL2tp_IterationNumber)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PppoL2tp_PortSummaryResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, PortName TEXT, Location, ConfigConnectRate REAL, ExpectedSessions INTEGER, ConnectedSuccessCount INTEGER, DisconnectedSuccessCount INTEGER, FailedConnectCount INTEGER, FailedDisconnectCount INTEGER, SuccSetupRate REAL, MinSetupTime REAL, MaxSetupTime REAL, AvgSetupTime REAL, AvgSuccessTransactionCount INTEGER, Tunnels INTEGER, TunnelUpCount INTEGER, TunnelDownCount INTEGER, TunnelSetupRate REAL, MinTunnelSetupTime REAL, MaxTunnelSetupTime REAL, AvgTunnelSetupTime REAL)

SELECT PR.PortName, Port.Location, PC.ConnectRate AS ConfigConnectRate, PR.Sessions AS ExpectedSessions, PR.ConnectedSuccessCount, PR.DisconnectedSuccessCount, PR.FailedConnectCount, PR.FailedDisconnectCount, SR.SuccSetupRate, SR.MinSetupTime, SR.MaxSetupTime, SR.AvgSetupTime, PR.AvgSuccessTransactionCount, TR.Tunnels, TR.TunnelUpCount, TR.TunnelDownCount, TR.TunnelSetupRate, TR.MinTunnelSetupTime, TR.MaxTunnelSetupTime, TR.AvgTunnelSetupTime FROM PppoxPortConfig AS PC, PppoePortResults AS PR, Port AS Port, PppoL2tp_IterationSessionRateResults AS SR, PppoL2tp_IterationTunnelResults AS TR, L2tpPortConfig WHERE PC.Handle == PR.ParentHnd AND L2tpPortConfig.L2tpNodeType == 'LAC' AND Port.Handle == PC.ParentHnd AND Port.Handle == L2tpPortConfig.ParentHnd AND SR.Location = Port.Location AND TR.Location = Port.Location

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PppoL2tp_IterationSystemSummaryResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, TotalConfigConnectRate REAL, TotalExpectedSessions INTEGER, TotalSuccessConnectCount INTEGER, TotalDisconnectedSuccessCount INTEGER, TotalFailedConnectCount INTEGER, TotalFailedDisconnectCount INTEGER, TotalSuccSetupRate REAL, TotalTunnels INTEGER, TotalTunnelUpCount INTEGER, TotalTunnelDownCount INTEGER, TotalTunnelSetupRate REAL)

SELECT SUM(PC.ConnectRate) AS TotalConfigConnectRate, SUM(PR.Sessions) AS TotalExpectedSessions, SUM(PR.ConnectedSuccessCount) AS TotalSuccessConnectCount, SUM(PR.DisconnectedSuccessCount) AS TotalDisconnectedSuccessCount, SUM(PR.FailedConnectCount) AS TotalFailedConnectCount, SUM(PR.FailedDisconnectCount) AS TotalFailedDisconnectCount, SUM(SR.SuccSetupRate) AS TotalSuccSetupRate, SUM(TR.Tunnels) AS TotalTunnels, SUM(TR.TunnelUpCount) AS TotalTunnelUpCount, SUM(TR.TunnelDownCount) AS TotalTunnelDownCount, SUM(TR.TunnelSetupRate) AS TotalTunnelSetupRate FROM PppoxPortConfig AS PC, PppoePortResults AS PR, L2tpPortResults, PppoL2tp_IterationSessionRateResults AS SR, PppoL2tp_IterationTunnelResults AS TR, Port, L2tpPortConfig WHERE PC.Handle == PR.ParentHnd AND L2tpPortConfig.Handle== L2tpPortResults.ParentHnd AND L2tpPortConfig.L2tpNodeType == 'LAC' AND SR.Location = Port.Location AND TR.Location = Port.Location AND Port.Handle = PC.ParentHnd AND Port.Handle = L2tpPortConfig.ParentHnd

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PppoL2tp_SystemSummaryResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, IterationMode, TotalConfigConnectRate REAL, TotalExpectedSessions INTEGER, TotalSuccessConnectCount INTEGER, TotalDisconnectedSuccessCount INTEGER, TotalFailedConnectCount INTEGER, TotalFailedDisconnectCount INTEGER, TotalSuccSetupRate REAL, TotalTunnels INTEGER, TotalTunnelUpCount INTEGER, TotalTunnelDownCount INTEGER, TotalTunnelSetupRate REAL)

SELECT (SELECT IterationNumber FROM PppoL2tp_IterationNumber) AS Iteration, (SELECT IterationMode FROM PppoL2tp_IterationMode) AS IterationMode, TotalConfigConnectRate, TotalExpectedSessions, TotalSuccessConnectCount, TotalDisconnectedSuccessCount, TotalFailedConnectCount, TotalFailedDisconnectCount, TotalSuccSetupRate, TotalTunnels, TotalTunnelUpCount, TotalTunnelDownCount, TotalTunnelSetupRate FROM PppoL2tp_IterationSystemSummaryResults

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PppoL2tp_PortSummaryResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, IterationMode, Location, ConfigConnectRate, ExpectedSessions, ConnectedSuccessCount, DisconnectedSuccessCount, FailedConnectCount, FailedDisconnectCount, SuccSetupRate, MinSetupTime, MaxSetupTime, AvgSetupTime, AvgSuccessTransactionCount, Tunnels, TunnelUpCount, TunnelDownCount, TunnelSetupRate, MinTunnelSetupTime, MaxTunnelSetupTime, AvgTunnelSetupTime)

SELECT (SELECT IterationNumber FROM PppoL2tp_IterationNumber) AS Iteration, (SELECT IterationMode FROM PppoL2tp_IterationMode) AS IterationMode, Location, ConfigConnectRate, ExpectedSessions, ConnectedSuccessCount, DisconnectedSuccessCount, FailedConnectCount, FailedDisconnectCount, SuccSetupRate, MinSetupTime, MaxSetupTime, AvgSetupTime, AvgSuccessTransactionCount, Tunnels, TunnelUpCount, TunnelDownCount, TunnelSetupRate, MinTunnelSetupTime, MaxTunnelSetupTime, AvgTunnelSetupTime FROM PppoL2tp_PortSummaryResults
SELECT EnablePercentTolerance, PercentTolerance FROM PppoL2tp_ThresholdTable

SELECT (SELECT IterationNumber FROM PppoL2tp_IterationNumber) AS Iteration, (SELECT IterationMode FROM PppoL2tp_IterationMode) AS 'Test Phase', TotalTunnels AS 'Total Tunnel Count', TotalTunnelUpCount AS 'Total Tunnel Up Count', TotalTunnelDownCount AS 'Total Tunnel Down Count', TotalTunnelSetupRate AS 'Total Successful Tunnel Setup Rate (tunnels/s)', TotalConfigConnectRate AS 'Total Config Connect Rate', TotalExpectedSessions AS 'Total Expected Session Count', TotalSuccessConnectCount AS 'Total Success Connect Count', TotalDisconnectedSuccessCount AS 'Total Success Disconnect Count', TotalFailedConnectCount AS 'Total Failed Connect Count', TotalFailedDisconnectCount AS 'Total Failed Disconnect Count', TotalSuccSetupRate AS 'Total Successful Setup Rate (sessions/s)' FROM PppoL2tp_IterationSystemSummaryResults

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PppoL2tp_FailedPorts (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Location, Tunnels, TunnelUpCount, TunnelDownCount, TunnelSetupRate, MinTunnelSetupTime, MaxTunnelSetupTime, AvgTunnelSetupTime, ExpectedSessions, ConnectedSuccessCount, FailedConnectCount, ConfigConnectRate, SuccSetupRate, MinSetupTime, MaxSetupTime, AvgSetupTime, AvgSuccessTransactionCount, EnablePercentTolerance, PercentTolerance, TunnelFail BOOL, SessionFail BOOL)

SELECT Location, Tunnels, TunnelUpCount, TunnelDownCount, TunnelSetupRate, MinTunnelSetupTime, MaxTunnelSetupTime, AvgTunnelSetupTime, ExpectedSessions, ConnectedSuccessCount, FailedConnectCount, ConfigConnectRate, SuccSetupRate, MinSetupTime, MaxSetupTime, AvgSetupTime, AvgSuccessTransactionCount, Thr.EnablePercentTolerance AS EnablePercentTolerance, Thr.PercentTolerance AS PercentTolerance FROM PppoL2tp_PortSummaryResults, PppoL2tp_ThresholdTable AS Thr WHERE (TunnelUpCount != Tunnels OR TunnelDownCount > 0 OR ConnectedSuccessCount != ExpectedSessions OR FailedConnectCount > 0 OR CASE WHEN Thr.EnablePercentTolerance='TRUE' THEN (SuccSetupRate < ( 1- Thr.PercentTolerance * 0.01) * ConfigConnectRate) ELSE 0 END)
UPDATE PppoL2tp_FailedPorts SET TunnelFail = 'TRUE' where TunnelUpCount != Tunnels OR TunnelDownCount > 0

UPDATE PppoL2tp_FailedPorts SET SessionFail = 'TRUE' where ConnectedSuccessCount != ExpectedSessions OR FailedConnectCount > 0 OR CASE (select EnablePercentTolerance from PppoL2tp_ThresholdTable ) WHEN 'TRUE' THEN (SuccSetupRate < ( 1- (select PercentTolerance from PppoL2tp_ThresholdTable) * 0.01) * ConfigConnectRate) ELSE 0 END

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PppoL2tp_FailedIterations (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, IterationMode, ExpectedSessions, ConnectedSuccessCount, FailedConnectCount, ConfigConnectRate, SuccSetupRate, TunnelFail BOOL, SessionFail BOOL)

SELECT (SELECT IterationNumber FROM PppoL2tp_IterationNumber, PppoL2tp_FailedPorts where TunnelFail='TRUE' OR SessionFail='TRUE') AS Iteration, (SELECT IterationMode FROM PppoL2tp_IterationMode, PppoL2tp_FailedPorts where TunnelFail='TRUE' OR SessionFail='TRUE') AS IterationMode, SUM(ExpectedSessions) AS ExpectedSessions, SUM(ConnectedSuccessCount) AS ConnectedSuccessCount, SUM(FailedConnectCount) AS FailedConnectCount, SUM(ConfigConnectRate) AS ConfigConnectRate, SUM(SuccSetupRate) AS SuccSetupRate FROM PppoL2tp_FailedPorts

UPDATE PppoL2tp_FailedIterations SET SessionFail = 'TRUE' where ConnectedSuccessCount != ExpectedSessions OR FailedConnectCount > 0 OR CASE (select EnablePercentTolerance from PppoL2tp_ThresholdTable ) WHEN 'TRUE' THEN (SuccSetupRate < ( 1- (select PercentTolerance from PppoL2tp_ThresholdTable) * 0.01) * ConfigConnectRate) ELSE 0 END
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PppoL2tp_TempFailedTunnelIteration (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, IterationMode, Tunnels, TunnelUpCount, TunnelDownCount, TunnelSetupRate)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PppoL2tp_TempFailedSessionIteration (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, IterationMode, ExpectedSessions, ConnectedSuccessCount, FailedConnectCount, ConfigConnectRate, SuccSetupRate)

SELECT (SELECT IterationNumber FROM PppoL2tp_IterationNumber, PppoL2tp_FailedPorts where TunnelFail='TRUE') AS Iteration, (SELECT IterationMode FROM PppoL2tp_IterationMode, PppoL2tp_FailedPorts where TunnelFail='TRUE') AS IterationMode, SUM(Tunnels) AS Tunnels, SUM(TunnelUpCount) AS TunnelUpCount, SUM(TunnelDownCount) AS TunnelDownCount, SUM(TunnelSetupRate) AS TunnelSetupRate FROM PppoL2tp_FailedPorts WHERE TunnelFail='TRUE'

SELECT (SELECT IterationNumber FROM PppoL2tp_IterationNumber, PppoL2tp_FailedPorts where SessionFail='TRUE') AS Iteration, (SELECT IterationMode FROM PppoL2tp_IterationMode, PppoL2tp_FailedPorts where SessionFail='TRUE') AS IterationMode, SUM(ExpectedSessions) AS ExpectedSessions, SUM(ConnectedSuccessCount) AS ConnectedSuccessCount, SUM(FailedConnectCount) AS FailedConnectCount, SUM(ConfigConnectRate) AS ConfigConnectRate, SUM(SuccSetupRate) AS SuccSetupRate FROM PppoL2tp_FailedPorts WHERE SessionFail='TRUE'

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PppoL2tp_TempFailedTunnelIteration WHERE Iteration>0) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Not all L2TPv2 tunnels were connected.

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, IterationMode AS 'Iteration Mode', Tunnels AS 'Tunnel Count', TunnelUpCount AS 'Tunnel Up Count', TunnelDownCount AS 'Tunnel Down Count', TunnelSetupRate AS 'Tunnel Setup Rate(tunnels/s)' FROM PppoL2tp_TempFailedTunnelIteration WHERE Iteration = (SELECT IterationNumber FROM PppoL2tp_IterationNumber)

SELECT Iteration, IterationMode, Tunnels, TunnelUpCount, TunnelDownCount, TunnelSetupRate FROM PppoL2tp_TempFailedTunnelIteration WHERE Iteration = (SELECT IterationNumber FROM PppoL2tp_IterationNumber)
DELETE FROM PppoL2tp_TempFailedTunnelIteration

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: All PPPoL2TPv2 sessions were connected and the successful setup rate was within acceptable tolerance of the configured setup rate.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PppoL2tp_TempFailedSessionIteration WHERE Iteration>0) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Not all PPPoL2TPv2 sessions were connected or the successful setup rate did not fall within acceptable tolerance of the configured setup rate.

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, IterationMode AS 'Iteration Mode', ExpectedSessions AS 'Expected Session Count', ConnectedSuccessCount As 'Successful Connection Count', FailedConnectCount AS 'Failed Connection Count', ConfigConnectRate AS 'Configured Rate (sessions/s)', SuccSetupRate AS 'Successful Setup Rate(sessions/s)' FROM PppoL2tp_TempFailedSessionIteration WHERE Iteration = (SELECT IterationNumber FROM PppoL2tp_IterationNumber)

SELECT Iteration, IterationMode, ExpectedSessions, ConnectedSuccessCount, FailedConnectCount, ConfigConnectRate, SuccSetupRate FROM PppoL2tp_TempFailedSessionIteration WHERE Iteration = (SELECT IterationNumber FROM PppoL2tp_IterationNumber)
DELETE FROM PppoL2tp_TempFailedSessionIteration

Children.Name: Results: Add Iteration Traffic Results to Temp Summary

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Results: Add Iteration Traffic Results to Temp Summary

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS xIterationSigFrameResults (Iteration INTEGER, PortName TEXT, PortHandle INTEGER, GeneratorSigFrameCount INTEGER, AnalyzerSigFrameCount INTEGER, AnalyzerDroppedCount INTEGER)

SELECT (SELECT Iteration FROM spirent_methodology_benchmarkstabilityiteratorcommand) AS 'Iteration', p.Name AS 'PortName', p.Handle AS 'PortHandle', gen.GeneratorSigFrameCount, ana.SigFrameCount AS 'AnalyzerSigFrameCount', ana.DroppedFrameCount AS 'AnalyzerDroppedCount' FROM GeneratorPortResults AS gen JOIN AnalyzerPortResults AS ana JOIN Port AS p WHERE gen.ParentPort == p.Handle AND ana.ParentPort == p.Handle

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS xIteration_Traffic_Failures (Iteration INTEGER, PortName TEXT, PortHandle INTEGER, GeneratorSigFrameCount INTEGER, AnalyzerSigFrameCount INTEGER, AnalyzerDroppedCount INTEGER)

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Tx/Rx Signature Frame Counts were greater than 0 and no packet loss detected.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE name='val_Iteration_Traffic_Results')) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Tx and/or Rx Signature Frame Counts were 0 or packet loss was detected.

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, PortName AS 'Port Name', GeneratorSigFrameCount AS 'TX Signature Frame Count', AnalyzerSigFrameCount AS 'RX Signature Frame Count', AnalyzerDroppedCount AS 'Dropped Frame Count' FROM xIterationSigFrameResults WHERE GeneratorSigFrameCount == 0 OR AnalyzerSigFrameCount == 0 OR AnalyzerDroppedCount > 0

SELECT Iteration, PortName, PortHandle, GeneratorSigFrameCount, AnalyzerSigFrameCount, AnalyzerDroppedCount FROM xIterationSigFrameResults WHERE GeneratorSigFrameCount == 0 OR AnalyzerSigFrameCount == 0 OR AnalyzerDroppedCount > 0

Properties.Name: Title
Properties.Value: PPPoL2TPv2 Iteration Successful Connected Tunnel/Session Rate

Children.Name: Run SQL Command: Display Iteration Port Statistics

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Run SQL Command: Display Iteration Port Statistics

sql_statement.static: SELECT P.Name AS 'Port Name', P.Location AS Location, L2tpConf.L2tpNodeType AS 'Protocol Emulation Mode', SR.Tunnels AS 'Tunnel Count', SR.TunnelUpCount AS 'Tunnel Up Count', SR.TunnelDownCount AS 'Tunnel Down Count', Res.TunnelPendingUpCount AS 'Tunnel Pending Up Count', Res.TunnelPendingDownCount AS 'Tunnel Pending Down Count', (CASE WHEN L2tpConf.L2tpNodeType=='LNS' THEN 'N/A' ELSE SR.TunnelSetupRate END) AS 'Successful Setup Rate (tunnels/s)', (CASE WHEN L2tpConf.L2tpNodeType=='LNS' THEN 'N/A' ELSE Res.MinTunnelSetupTime END) AS 'Minimum Setup Time (ms)', (CASE WHEN L2tpConf.L2tpNodeType=='LNS' THEN 'N/A' ELSE Res.MaxTunnelSetupTime END) AS 'Maximum Setup Time (ms)', (CASE WHEN L2tpConf.L2tpNodeType=='LNS' THEN 'N/A' ELSE SR.AvgTunnelSetupTime END) AS 'Average Setup Time (ms)' FROM L2tpPortConfig AS L2tpConf, L2tpPortResults AS Res, Port AS P, PppoL2tp_PortSummaryResults AS SR WHERE L2tpConf.Handle == Res.ParentHnd AND P.Handle == L2tpConf.ParentHnd AND SR.Location == P.Location

SELECT Res.PortName AS 'Port Name', P.Location AS Location, L2tpConf.L2tpNodeType AS 'Protocol Emulation Mode', Conf.ConnectRate AS 'Configured Connect Rate', Conf.DisconnectRate AS 'Configured Disconnect Rate', Res.Sessions AS 'Session Count', Res.AttemptedCount AS 'Attempted Count', Res.RetryCount AS 'Retry Count', Res.ConnectedSuccessCount AS 'Connected Success Count', Res.FailedConnectCount AS 'Failed Connect Count', Res.DisconnectedSuccessCount AS 'Disconnected Success Count', Res.FailedDisconnectCount AS 'Failed Disconnect Count', (CASE WHEN L2tpConf.L2tpNodeType=='LNS' THEN 'N/A' ELSE SR.SuccSetupRate END) AS 'Successful Setup Rate (sessions/s)', (CASE WHEN L2tpConf.L2tpNodeType=='LNS' THEN 'N/A' ELSE Res.MinSetupTime END) AS 'Minimum Setup Time (ms)', (CASE WHEN L2tpConf.L2tpNodeType=='LNS' THEN 'N/A' ELSE Res.MaxSetupTime END) AS 'Maximum Setup Time (ms)', (CASE WHEN L2tpConf.L2tpNodeType=='LNS' THEN 'N/A' ELSE SR.AvgSetupTime END) AS 'Average Setup Time (ms)' FROM PppoxPortConfig AS Conf, L2tpPortConfig AS L2tpConf, PppoePortResults AS Res, Port AS P, PppoL2tp_PortSummaryResults AS SR WHERE P.Handle == Conf.ParentHnd AND Conf.Handle == Res.ParentHnd AND P.Handle == L2tpConf.ParentHnd AND SR.Location == P.Location

SELECT P.Name AS 'Port Name', P.Location AS Location, L2tpConf.L2tpNodeType AS 'Protocol Emulation Mode', Ps.Tunnels AS 'Tunnel Count', SUM(Res.TxAckCount) AS 'Tx ACK Count', SUM(Res.RxAckCount) AS 'Rx ACK Count', SUM(Res.TxHelloCount) AS 'Tx Hello Count', SUM(Res.RxHelloCount) AS 'Rx Hello Count', SUM(Res.TxStartCcRequestCount) AS 'Tx Start CC Request Count', SUM(Res.RxStartCcRequestCount) AS 'Rx Start CC Request Count', SUM(Res.TxStartCcReplyCount) AS 'Tx Start CC Reply Count', SUM(Res.RxStartCcReplyCount) AS 'Rx Start CC Reply Count', SUM(Res.TxStartCcConnectCount) AS 'Tx Start CC Connect Count', SUM(Res.RxStartCcConnectCount) AS 'Rx Start CC Connect Count', SUM(TxStopCcNotifyCount) AS 'Tx Stop CC Notify Count', SUM(RxStopCcNotifyCount) AS 'Rx Stop CC Notify Count', SUM(TxWanErrorNotifyCount) AS 'Tx WAN Error Notify Count', SUM(RxWanErrorNotifyCount) AS 'Rx WAN Error Notify Count', SUM(TxSetLinkInfoCount) AS 'Tx Set Link Info Count', SUM(RxSetLinkInfoCount) AS 'Rx Set Link Info Count', SUM(TxOutgoingCallRequestCount) AS 'Tx Outgoing Call Request Count', SUM(RxOutgoingCallRequestCount) AS 'Rx Outgoing Call Request Count', SUM(TxOutgoingCallReplyCount) AS 'Tx Outgoing Call Reply Count', SUM(RxOutgoingCallReplyCount) AS 'Rx Outgoing Call Reply Count', SUM(TxOutgoingCallConnectCount) AS 'Tx Outgoing Call Connect Count', SUM(RxOutgoingCallConnectCount) AS 'Rx Outgoing Call Connect Count', SUM(TxIncomingCallRequestCount) AS 'Tx Incoming Call Request Count', SUM(RxIncomingCallRequestCount) AS 'Rx Incoming Call Request Count', SUM(TxIncomingCallReplyCount) AS 'Tx Incoming Call Reply Count', SUM(RxIncomingCallReplyCount) AS 'Rx Incoming Call Reply Count', SUM(TxIncomingCallConnectCount) AS 'Tx Incoming Call Connect Count', SUM(RxIncomingCallConnectCount) AS 'Rx Incoming Call Connect Count', SUM(TxCallDisconnectNotifyCount) AS 'Tx Call Disconnect Notify Count', SUM(RxCallDisconnectNotifyCount) AS 'Rx Call Disconnect Notify Count' FROM PppoL2tp_PortSummaryResults as Ps, L2tpPortConfig AS L2tpConf, L2tpv2BlockResults AS Res, Port AS P WHERE P.Handle == L2tpConf.ParentHnd AND Ps.Location == P.Location

report.explanation: PPP LCP packet statistics per port.

sql_statement.static: SELECT Res.PortName AS 'Port Name', P.Location AS Location, L2tpConf.L2tpNodeType AS 'Protocol Emulation Mode', Res.Sessions AS 'Session Count', Res.TxLcpConfigRequestCount AS 'Tx LCP Config Request Count', Res.RxLcpConfigRequestCount AS 'Rx LCP Config Request Count', Res.TxLcpConfigRejectCount AS 'Tx LCP Config Reject Count', Res.RxLcpConfigRejectCount AS 'Rx LCP Config Reject Count', Res.TxLcpConfigAckCount AS 'Tx LCP Config Ack Count', Res.RxLcpConfigAckCount AS 'Rx LCP Config Ack Count', Res.TxLcpConfigNakCount AS 'Tx LCP Config Nak Count', Res.RxLcpConfigNakCount AS 'Rx LCP Config Nak Count', Res.TxLcpTermRequestCount AS 'Tx LCP Terminate Request Count', Res.RxLcpTermRequestCount AS 'Rx LCP Terminate Request Count', Res.TxLcpTermAckCount AS 'Tx LCP Terminate Ack Count', Res.RxLcpTermAckCount AS 'Rx LCP Terminate Ack Count', Res.TxLcpEchoRequestCount AS 'Tx LCP Echo Request Count', Res.RxLcpEchoRequestCount AS 'Rx LCP Echo Request Count', Res.TxLcpEchoReplyCount AS 'Tx LCP Echo Reply Count', Res.RxLcpEchoReplyCount AS 'Rx LCP Echo Reply Count' FROM PppoxPortConfig AS Conf, L2tpPortConfig as L2tpConf, PppoePortResults AS Res, Port AS P WHERE P.Handle == Conf.ParentHnd AND Conf.Handle == Res.ParentHnd AND P.Handle == L2tpConf.ParentHnd

report.explanation: PPP Authentication and NCP packet statistics per port.
report.display_name: PPP Authentication and NCP Packet Statistics

sql_statement.static: SELECT Res.PortName AS 'Port Name', P.Location AS Location, L2tpConf.L2tpNodeType AS 'Protocol Emulation Mode', Res.Sessions AS 'Sessions Count', Res.TxIpcpCount AS 'Tx IPCP Count', Res.RxIpcpCount AS 'Rx IPCP Count', Res.TxIpv6cpCount AS 'Tx IPv6CP Count', Res.RxIpv6cpCount AS 'Rx IPv6CP Count', Res.TxPapCount AS 'Tx PAP Count', Res.RxPapCount AS 'Rx PAP Count', Res.TxChapCount AS 'Tx CHAP Count', Res.RxChapCount AS 'Rx CHAP Count' FROM PppoxPortConfig AS Conf, L2tpPortConfig AS L2tpConf, PppoePortResults AS Res, Port AS P WHERE P.Handle == Conf.ParentHnd AND Conf.Handle == Res.ParentHnd AND P.Handle == L2tpConf.ParentHnd

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Value: Parameters that affect results collection and verdict generation.

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PPPoL2tpConfig ('Parameter' VARCHAR(64), 'Value' VARCHAR(64))
insert into PPPoL2tpConfig(Parameter, Value) values('Binary Search Minimum Rate (sessions/s)', (select MinVal from spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand))
insert into PPPoL2tpConfig(Parameter, Value) values('Binary Search Maximum Rate (sessions/s)', (select MaxVal from spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand))
insert into PPPoL2tpConfig(Parameter, Value) values('Benchmark Step Rate (sessions/s)', (select StepVal from spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand))

insert into PPPoL2tpConfig(Parameter, Value) values('Enable Stability Backoff', (select case when EnableStabilityBackoff=1 then 'TRUE' else 'FALSE' end from spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand))

insert into PPPoL2tpConfig(Parameter, Value) select 'Stability Success Percent', (select successpercent from spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand) from spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand where exists (select * from spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand where EnableStabilityBackoff=1)

insert into PPPoL2tpConfig(Parameter, Value) select 'Stability Repeat Count', (select repeatcount from spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand) from spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand where exists (select * from spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand where EnableStabilityBackoff=1)
insert into PPPoL2tpConfig(Parameter, Value) values('IPCP Encapsulation', (select IpcpEncap from PppoL2tpv2ClientBlockConfig))
insert into PPPoL2tpConfig(Parameter, Value) values('Maximum Outstanding Sessions', (select SessionOutstanding from PppoxPortConfig limit 1))
insert into PPPoL2tpConfig(Parameter, Value) values('Type of Authentication', (select Authentication from PppoL2tpv2ClientBlockConfig ))
insert into PPPoL2tpConfig(Parameter, Value) values('Enable Auto Retry', (select case when EnableAutoRetry=1 then 'TRUE' else 'FALSE' end from PppoL2tpv2ClientBlockConfig))

insert into PPPoL2tpConfig(Parameter, Value) select 'Auto Retry Count', (select AutoRetryCount from PppoL2tpv2ClientBlockConfig) where exists (select * from PppoL2tpv2ClientBlockConfig where EnableAutoRetry=1)
insert into PPPoL2tpConfig(Parameter, Value) values('Enable Echo Requests', (select case when EnableEchoRequest=1 then 'TRUE' else 'FALSE' end from PppoL2tpv2ClientBlockConfig))

insert into PPPoL2tpConfig(Parameter, Value) select 'Maximum Echo Request Attempt', (select MaxEchoRequestAttempts from PppoL2tpv2ClientBlockConfig) where exists (select * from PppoL2tpv2ClientBlockConfig where EnableEchoRequest=1)

insert into PPPoL2tpConfig(Parameter, Value) select 'Interval Between Sending Out Consecutive Echo Requests (s)', (select EchoRequestGenFreq from PppoL2tpv2ClientBlockConfig) where exists (select * from PppoL2tpv2ClientBlockConfig where EnableEchoRequest=1)
insert into PPPoL2tpConfig(Parameter, Value) values('LCP Config Request Timeout (s)', (select LcpConfigRequestTimeout from PppoL2tpv2ClientBlockConfig))
insert into PPPoL2tpConfig(Parameter, Value) values('LCP Config Request Max Attempts', (select LcpConfigRequestMaxAttempts from PppoL2tpv2ClientBlockConfig))
insert into PPPoL2tpConfig(Parameter, Value) values('NCP Config Request Timeout (s)', (select NcpConfigRequestTimeout from PppoL2tpv2ClientBlockConfig))
insert into PPPoL2tpConfig(Parameter, Value) values('NCP Config Request Max Attempts', (select NcpConfigRequestMaxAttempts from PppoL2tpv2ClientBlockConfig))
insert into PPPoL2tpConfig(Parameter, Value) values('Enable L2TPv2 Auto Retry', (select case when EnableAutoRetry=1 then 'TRUE' else 'FALSE' end from L2tpv2BlockConfig))
insert into PPPoL2tpConfig(Parameter, Value) select 'L2TPv2 Auto Retry Count', (select AutoRetryCount from L2tpv2BlockConfig) where exists (select * from L2tpv2BlockConfig where EnableAutoRetry=1)
insert into PPPoL2tpConfig(Parameter, Value) values('Enable L2TPv2 Hello', (select case when EnableHello=1 then 'TRUE' else 'FALSE' end from L2tpv2BlockConfig))
insert into PPPoL2tpConfig(Parameter, Value) select 'L2TPv2 Hello Interval (s)', (select HelloTimeOut from L2tpv2BlockConfig) where exists (select * from L2tpv2BlockConfig where EnableHello=1)
select 'Enable Session Rate Percent Tolerance' as Parameter, EnablePercentTolerance as Value from PppoL2tp_ThresholdTable
select 'Session Rate Tolerance (%)' as Parameter, PercentTolerance as Value from PppoL2tp_ThresholdTable where exists (select * from PppoL2tp_ThresholdTable where EnablePercentTolerance='TRUE')
select Parameter as 'Parameter', Value as 'Configured Value'  from PPPoL2tpConfig

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PppoL2tp_IteratorEndState (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, EnableStabilityBackoff, SearchMinVal, SearchMaxVal, StabilityRepeatCount, StabilityBackoffStep, StabilitySuccessPercent, IsConverged, ConvergedVal, FoundStableValue, StableValue)

SELECT EnableStabilityBackoff, MinVal AS SearchMinVal, MaxVal AS SearchMaxVal, RepeatCount AS StabilityRepeatCount, StepVal AS StabilityBackoffStep, SuccessPercent AS StabilitySuccessPercent, IsConverged, ConvergedVal, FoundStableValue, StableValue FROM spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand WHERE (SELECT Iter.Handle FROM Tag AS Tag, RelationTable AS RT, spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand AS Iter WHERE Tag.Name='spirent.methodology.benchmarkstabilityiteratorcommand.11111' AND RT.TargetHnd=Tag.Handle AND RT.SourceHnd=Iter.Handle AND RT.Type='UserTag')
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PppoL2tp_ScaleResult (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, IsConverged, ConvergedVal)
SELECT IsConverged, ConvergedVal FROM PppoL2tp_IteratorEndState
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PppoL2tp_StabilityResult (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, EnableStabilityBackoff, FoundStableValue, StableValue)
SELECT EnableStabilityBackoff, FoundStableValue, StableValue FROM PppoL2tp_IteratorEndState
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS PppoL2tp_StabilityScaleValueResult (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, StabilityScaleValueResult)

SELECT (CASE WHEN ES.EnableStabilityBackoff=1 THEN (CASE WHEN Stability.FoundStableValue=1 THEN Stability.StableValue ELSE 0 END) ELSE (CASE WHEN Scale.IsConverged=1 THEN Scale.ConvergedVal ELSE 0 END) END) AS StabilityScaleValueResult FROM PppoL2tp_IteratorEndState AS ES, PppoL2tp_StabilityResult AS Stability, PppoL2tp_ScaleResult AS Scale

Children.Name: Results: Tunnel and Session Setup Rate Chart

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Results: Tunnel and Session Setup Rate Chart

Properties.Name: Series
Value: SELECT SUM(TunnelSetupRate) FROM PppoL2tp_TunnelResults WHERE EmulationType='LAC'  GROUP BY Iteration
SELECT SUM(SuccSetupRate) FROM PppoL2tp_SessionRateResults WHERE EmulationType='LAC'  GROUP BY Iteration
SELECT SUM(ConfigSetupRate) FROM PppoL2tp_SessionRateResults WHERE EmulationType='LAC' GROUP BY Iteration

Properties.Name: Series
Value: SELECT MIN(MinTunnelSetupTime) FROM PppoL2tp_TunnelResults WHERE EmulationType='LAC' GROUP BY Iteration
SELECT AVG(AvgTunnelSetupTime) FROM PppoL2tp_TunnelResults WHERE EmulationType='LAC' GROUP BY Iteration
SELECT MAX(MaxTunnelSetupTime) FROM PppoL2tp_TunnelResults WHERE EmulationType='LAC' GROUP BY Iteration
SELECT MIN(MinSetupTime) FROM PppoL2tp_SessionRateResults WHERE EmulationType='LAC' GROUP BY Iteration
SELECT AVG(AvgSetupTime) FROM PppoL2tp_SessionRateResults WHERE EmulationType='LAC'  GROUP BY Iteration
SELECT MAX(MaxSetupTime) FROM PppoL2tp_SessionRateResults WHERE EmulationType='LAC'  GROUP BY Iteration

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration AS 'Iteration', (CASE WHEN IterationMode='SEARCH' THEN 'Binary Search' ELSE 'Stability' END) AS 'Test Phase', TotalConfigConnectRate AS 'Total Config Rate (sessions/s)', TotalTunnels AS 'Total Configured Tunnels', TotalTunnelUpCount AS 'Total Tunnel Up Count', TotalTunnelDownCount AS 'Total Tunnel Down Count', TotalTunnelSetupRate AS 'Total Tunnel Setup Rate (tunnels/s)', TotalExpectedSessions AS 'Total Expected Session Count', TotalSuccessConnectCount AS 'Total Successful Connection Count', TotalFailedConnectCount AS 'Total Failed Connection Count', TotalFailedDisconnectCount AS 'Total Failed Disconnect Count', TotalSuccSetupRate AS 'Total Successful Setup Rate (sessions/s)' FROM PppoL2tp_SystemSummaryResults

Children.Name: Results: Verify Threshold and Generate Verdict

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Results: Verify Threshold and Generate Verdict

sql_statement.static: SELECT SearchMinVal AS 'Search Minimum Rate (sessions/s)', SearchMaxVal AS 'Search Maximum Rate (sessions/s)', (CASE WHEN EnableStabilityBackoff = 1 THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END) AS 'Enable Stability Backoff', StabilityRepeatCount AS 'Stability Repeat Count', StabilityBackoffStep AS 'Stability Backoff Step (sessions/s)', StabilitySuccessPercent AS 'Stability Backoff Success Percent' FROM PppoL2tp_IteratorEndState

report.explanation: Verifies that the search phase of the session scale rate benchmarking converged on a final value.

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: A session scale rate that included no session failures was found.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN IsConverged=0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM PppoL2tp_ScaleResult

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: A session scale rate that included no session failures was not found.

sql_statement.static: SELECT ConvergedVal AS 'Session Scale Rate (sessions/s)' FROM PppoL2tp_ScaleResult

report.explanation: Verifies that the stability phase of the session rate benchmarking found a stable value.

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: A stable session rate was found using the configured repeats and success percent.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN FoundStableValue=0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM PppoL2tp_StabilityResult

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: A stable session rate was not found using the configured repeats and success percent.

sql_statement.static: SELECT StableValue AS 'Stable Session Rate (sessions/s)' FROM PppoL2tp_StabilityResult

report.explanation: Verifies that the stable or scale value found met the threshold conditions.

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Session scale or stability rate met threshold conditions.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT name FROM sqlite_master

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Session scale or stability rate did not meet threshold conditions.

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, (CASE WHEN (select EnablePercentTolerance from PppoL2tp_ThresholdTable) ='TRUE' THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END) AS 'Enable Threshold Session Rate',  (1 - (select PercentTolerance from PppoL2tp_ThresholdTable) / 100.0) * TotalConfigConnectRate AS 'Threshold Session Rate (sessions/s)',  TotalSuccSetupRate AS 'Total Successful Setup Rate (sessions/s)' FROM PppoL2tp_SystemSummaryResults where TotalSuccSetupRate < (1 - (select PercentTolerance from PppoL2tp_ThresholdTable) / 100.0) * TotalConfigConnectRate

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 5806
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Enable check in SQL for a found stable value

Frontend.Name: StmExposedProperty 7007
Frontend.EpDescription: IP version to use in the test

Frontend.Name: StmExposedProperty 7009
Frontend.EpDescription: Enables a check of the actual session rate against a percent tolerance of the configured session rate

Frontend.Name: StmExposedProperty 7010
Frontend.EpDescription: Enable the stability backoff phase of benchmarking to determine if the rate found through binary search is stable

Frontend.Name: StmExposedProperty 20340
Frontend.EpDescription: Maximum number of sessions in progress, which includes the sessions in the process of coming up or disconnecting at one time

Frontend.Name: StmExposedProperty 9335
Frontend.EpDescription: Load unit applied to the stream block

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 1148
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Port group containing ports that will emulate PPPooL2TPv2 clients.

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 20728
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Port group containing hosts that will emulate endpoint of PPPooL2TPv2 traffic.
